tasks.title: Set up Next.js project foundation
tasks.description: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and proper folder structure using App Router
tasks.details: Create a new Next.js project with TypeScript support, Tailwind CSS for styling, and App Router. Set up ESLint, Prettier, and basic project configuration files.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project runs successfully with npm run dev, build completes without errors

tasks.title: Create responsive navigation component
tasks.description: Build a responsive navigation header with mobile menu functionality
tasks.details: Create a navigation component with logo, menu items (Home, About, Services, Contact), and hamburger menu for mobile devices. Include smooth transitions and accessibility features.
tasks.testStrategy: Test navigation on different screen sizes, verify all links work, check keyboard navigation

tasks.title: Develop homepage with hero section
tasks.description: Create the main landing page with hero section, features, and call-to-action elements
tasks.details: Build homepage with hero section containing company tagline and CTA buttons, featured services showcase, company statistics, customer testimonials section, and newsletter subscription form.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all sections render correctly, test CTA buttons, validate newsletter form

tasks.title: Build About Us page
tasks.description: Create company information page with team section and company values
tasks.details: Develop About Us page with company history, mission statement, team members section with photos and bios, company values and culture section, awards and certifications display.
tasks.testStrategy: Check content display, verify image loading, test responsive layout

tasks.title: Create Services/Products page
tasks.description: Build comprehensive services and products showcase page with filtering
tasks.details: Create services page with categorized service listings, product catalog with filtering options, pricing information where applicable, request quote functionality, and featured case studies.
tasks.testStrategy: Test filtering functionality, verify product display, validate quote request form

tasks.title: Implement Contact page with form
tasks.description: Build contact page with validated form and map integration
tasks.details: Create contact page with validated contact form, office locations with map integration, business hours display, contact information (phone, email), social media links, and FAQ section.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form validation and submission, verify map display, check all contact links

tasks.title: Create footer component
tasks.description: Build comprehensive footer with links, social media, and company information
tasks.details: Develop footer component with quick navigation links, social media icons, contact information, copyright notice, and newsletter subscription option.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all links work correctly, test responsive layout, check social media links

tasks.title: Implement SEO and metadata
tasks.description: Add SEO optimization with proper metadata, structured data, and sitemap
tasks.details: Implement SEO best practices including metadata for all pages, Open Graph tags, structured data markup, XML sitemap, robots.txt, and canonical URLs.
tasks.testStrategy: Run SEO audit tools, verify metadata in browser, test Open Graph preview

tasks.title: Add performance optimizations
tasks.description: Optimize website performance for Core Web Vitals and fast loading
tasks.details: Implement performance optimizations including image optimization and lazy loading, code splitting, font optimization, caching strategies, and bundle size reduction.
tasks.testStrategy: Run Lighthouse audit, measure Core Web Vitals, test page load times

tasks.title: Deploy to Vercel
tasks.description: Set up deployment pipeline and deploy website to Vercel
tasks.details: Configure Vercel deployment with environment variables, custom domain setup, SSL certificate, security headers, and CI/CD pipeline integration.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify deployment success, test production site functionality, check SSL and security
